node.statement: NUMERICAL VERIFICATION. Verify the reformulated inequality (Phi_n(p)-Phi_n(r))(Phi_n(q)-Phi_n(r)) >= Phi_n(r)^2 computationally at n=2,3,4,5 with random polynomials. Also compute: (a) the vectors alpha, beta from implicit differentiation of F(z,w) = r'(z)p(w) - p'(w)r(z) = 0, (b) the inner products <h,alpha>, <h,beta>, (c) whether A = 2<h,alpha> + ||alpha||^2 > 0 always holds (i.e., Phi_n(p) > Phi_n(r)).
